sentences.english: I don't think he will jump his hotel bill.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他不會不付旅館賬單就溜掉的。

sentences.english: You can get your newsletters or bills over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那裏瀏覽時事通訊或賬單。

sentences.english: I would like to attach the in voices for my phone bill this season.
sentences.chinese: 我想把這一季的電話賬單發票貼上去。

sentences.english: I could even examine the sheaf of bills without cringing.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至可以毫不畏懼地打開那一疊賬單了。

sentences.english: We pay all our bills by direct debit.
sentences.chinese: 我們以直接借記方式支付所有賬單。

sentences.english: The waiter hands him the bill and the guest signs his name on it.
sentences.chinese: 服務員遞過賬單，客人在上面簽了名。

sentences.english: At the national level, net food importers may see their food import bills rising.
sentences.chinese: 在國家一級，純糧食進口國會發現進口賬單日益高漲。

sentences.english: The waiter goes back to the cashier to have the amount changed.
sentences.chinese: 服務員回到收款處修改了賬單。

sentences.english: "I'm gonna pay my bills, " Perry says, "especially the oil bills! "
sentences.chinese: 我要去交付我的賬單了，佩裏說道，尤其是油錢。

sentences.english: G:Hello.I have a question about my bill.
sentences.chinese: 旅客:你好，我想詢問一個關於賬單的問題。

sentences.english: The first bill you pay each month should be to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你每個月的第一筆賬單必須是支付自己的。

sentences.english: Make sure you pay your bills in advance, like your mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 當然，要確保提前支付你的賬單，比如你的房屋貸款。

sentences.english: Mail and personal bills were handled by C&D's back office because of his inattention.
sentences.chinese: C&D的後勤部門要幫他處理信件和個人的賬單。

sentences.english: She baled up her money on receiving the bill.
sentences.chinese: 她收到賬單後勉強付了賬。

sentences.english: The checkbook stubs don't tally with my Bank statement.
sentences.chinese: 支票薄存根與我的銀行對賬單不相符合。

definition: the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
to transfer (money to a bank account)
